content: श्रुत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [श्रु-क्त] {@--1@} Heard, listened to. {@--2@} Reported, heard of. {@--3@} Learnt, ascertained, understood. {@--4@} Well-known, famous, celebrated, renowned; श्रुतस्य किं तत्सदृशं कुलस्य <ls>R. 14. 61</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 40.</ls> {@--5@} Named, called. --तं {@--1@} The object of hearing. {@--2@} That which was heard by revelation; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the Veda, holy learning, sacred knowledge; श्रुतप्रकाशं <ls>R. 5. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Learning in general (विद्या); श्रोत्रं श्रुतेनैव न कुंडलेन (विभाति) <ls>Bh. 2. 71</ls>, <ls>R. 3. 21</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 22</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 147</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">4. 68.</ls>
